src:
Postavni Slovenec bo kmalu očka, znan že spol otroka
Konec meseca se bosta veselila naraščaja.
06 Nov 2019, 12:47 by B. Z.



Iztok in njegova izvoljenka Katarina čez manj kot mesec dni pričakujeta rojstvo sina. FOTO: Osebni arhiv



Novega družinskega člana se že zelo veselita. FOTO: Osebni arhiv


Postavni osebni trener in maneken Iztok Hodnik se niti za hip ne utegne pritoževati nad dolgčasom, saj se njegovo življenje odvija z vrtoglavo hitrostjo.


Novega družinskega člana se že zelo veselita. FOTO: Osebni arhiv

»V zadnjem mesecu sem posnel dva televizijska oglasa, enega avtomobilskega in enega za SPIRIT Slovenija – javno agencijo za spodbujanje podjetništva. V obeh reklamah sem vozil prestižne avtomobile, tako da je bilo zelo zanimivo,« pravi Iztok, ki še vedno dela kot osebni trener v svoji telovadnici in skrbi za fizično pripravo gledaliških igralcev v MGL in SNG Drama Ljubljana.Pestro pa je tudi njegovo zasebno življenje. S punco Katarino Tratar, ki je prav tako voditeljica skupinskih vadb, se po štirih letih ljubezni pripravljata na množino. »Moja Katarina bo konec novembra rodila najinega prvega otroka. Zdravniki pravijo, da bo fantek, midva pa že komaj čakava, da ga spoznava,« se veseli Iztok, ki svoji Katarini stoji ob strani in ji pomaga pri nakupovanju zadnjih potrebščin za novega družinskega člana.
text:
The posing Slovenian will soon be a daddy, already known for the gender of a baby
At the end of the month they will look forward to growing.
06 Nov 2019, 12:47 by B. Z.



In less than a month, Iztok and his elected wife, Katarina, are expecting a son to be born. PHOTO: Personal Archive



They are already looking forward to a new family member. PHOTO: Personal Archive


Line-up personal trainer and model Iztok Hodnik can't even complain about boredom for a moment, as his life is going at a dizzying pace.


They are already looking forward to a new family member. PHOTO: Personal Archive

“In the last month, I shot two television ads, one for car and one for SPIRIT Slovenia - a public agency to promote entrepreneurship. I used to drive prestigious cars in both commercials, so it was very interesting, "says Iztok, who still works as a personal trainer in his gym and takes care of the physical preparation of theater actors at MGL and SNG Drama Ljubljana. His private life is also varied. . With girlfriend Katarina Tratar, who is also the leader of group exercises, after four years of love, they are preparing for the crowd. “At the end of November, my Catharine will give birth to our first child. Doctors say he'll be a boy, and we can't wait to get to know him.
